p: In the RCT of Zhao et al. examining breast cancer patients with cancer-related fatigue undergoing endocrine therapy treated with Ganoderma lucidum no serious adverse effects were reported during the study. Only “mild discomfort” was recorded, and these are shown in a table for the verum group only. The two most common discomfort were dizziness (16%) and dry mouth (12%) ( Zhao et al., 2012).
